data.title: Added 2x replay speed button
data.body: As described in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/6466. This is required since the optimizations in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/5850.

data.title: Fixed a glitch at the tech center on map Zeus
data.body: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/4264300/35b71638-3c20-11e4-87cc-c123c5ab3559.png)

data.title: "Improved game loop" makes it hard to keep track of the actually gameplay
data.body:
this is mostly a "DEV" feature , and it excludes player who want to watch their replays in a proper speed ... and still being able to keep track of the actually gameplay ...

it feels like a regression to me , so i would be very pleased if someone fix that before we pump out the new release ... because im watching alot of replays ... (also the streaming-people use the speed-up)

data.title: Minor offset issues with barrels, muzzle flashes...
data.body:
As mentioned in #6283, the barrel offset jitters when the actor is moving while targeting something, because the offset re-calculation when the actor changes its facing appears to be not fast enough to keep the visual position of the barrel(s) 'stable'. The main problem appears to be the sideways (left/right) offset, but that was just my impression.

As this affects the TS Titan and a project of mine, it would be nice if this was adressed eventually.

data.title: Craters/Scorches are spawned even if something was hit
data.body:
That might be ok if the target is a small infantry unit, but a crater forming below a mammoth tank or building looks weird.

Apollo is based on Zeus, and thus Zeus's beach island was also affected.

Fixes #6443

data.body: Followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/6342 that adds the fill animation and blinking lights including the critical damage state.

data.title: False audio-feedback when using F-hotkeys.
data.body: If an actor is not buildable (due to your techtree) atm but is visible in the build palette you can use the F1-12 hotkey corresponding to it and get the "building" audio feedback, when in fact it is not building.

data.title: Renamed AdpcmLoader to ImaAdpcmLoader
data.body:
In order to make clear that this is only for IMA ADPCM, and not other ADPCM formats like Microsoft ADPCM.

Furthermore back-ported some style fixes to AudLoader.

data.title: Fixed fast bullet projectiles passing through walls
data.body: As described in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/5294. Tested against the Dune 2000 trike.

data.title: Snow specific building art
data.body:
I'm reaching for the stars here. But it would be cool if we had building artwork for snow maps like RA2 did IIRC.

data.title: Removed the BelowUnits trait
data.body: as discussed in #3670. It is replaced by per sequence ZOffsets and won't conflict with it anymore.

data.title: Renamed Wall to BlocksBullets
data.body: ...additionally removed duplicate crush functionality and used the refactored Crushable instead.

data.title: Follow-up to #6396 (WithDeathAnimation)
data.body: Fixes a copy-paste error introduced with a last-minute change to #6396.

data.title: More OSX launcher tweaks
data.body:
![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/167819/4262202/207d1b60-3b93-11e4-91e9-f17630f7a889.png)
- Require a framework install of Mono, as our .config files reference dylibs installed to the frameworks dir.
- Bump the minimum Mono version to 3.2, which included the SGen GC.
- Update download link for the new Mono website.
- Reference the MRE package to reduce potential confusion.

After this has been merged I will manually backport this, #6300, #6307, and #6438 to our release-20140722 OSX package to solve the current crash and startup perf issues.

data.title: Added "Civilian building captured" notification to TD tech buildings
data.body: Closes #4487.

data.body: Fixes #6444.

```
(12:47:03) pchote: a tank shot in the same tick it died
(12:47:04) pchote: easy fix
(12:47:20) pchote: just need to set inaccuracy = 0 in that case, or pass it in as an arg
(12:47:39) pchote: maybe as a projectilearg, to be consistent with firepower
```

data.title: Disable replay saving for campaign missions.
data.body:
Allowing players to view replays of campaign missions introduces two significant issues:
1. Desyncs and other issues due to the current implementation of FMVs (see #6210).
2. Players can easily cheat or accidentally spoil themselves by loading a replay and spying on the map layout and enemy forces.

In an ideal world (1) would be solved by moving the FMVs outside the world state (briefings integrated with the campaign menu and pause-menu briefing tab, end-game FMVs integrated with the post-game screen) and (2) would be solved by special-casing these missions to lock the shroud selector to the player view.  Both of these will require a fair amount of effort.

I propose that as a short-term solution we just disable replays for these missions.  The downside of this specific approach (as opposed to filtering them in the replay browser) is that we lose a debug tool that is (very) occasionally useful (e.g. #6076).

data.title: Support pasting clipboard text into TextFields.
data.body: Based on #6364, with some changes to improve pasting into length-limited fields.
